detail_desc: Boots in imitation leather with adjustable straps at the front with metal buckles, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3.5 cm.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Long viscose twill parka with a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and a drawstring at the waist. Flap chest pockets, patch front pockets with a flap, ribbed cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and half-string back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lined triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, lightweight cotton denim. Slim fit and wide legs. Elasticated, paper bag waist with press-studs, a fake fly and diagonal side pockets. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Round-necked blouse in a softly draping weave with concealed fasteners at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Jersey T-shirt in a cotton and modal blend with a flock-print text on the front.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Lace-trimmed V-neck and long sleeves.

Top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and a button placket. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats at the front of the waistband, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down the sides and at the crotch.

Playsuit in an airy weave made from a ramie blend with notch lapels, buttons at the top and open chest pockets. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a seam with elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and decorative buttons below the waist.
Short-sleeved top in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit shaftless socks with a silicone trim around the heel to hold them in place.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Super push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Front fastening and adjustable shoulder straps that join at the back.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with motifs, a hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with long ties.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in sturdy washed denim in a loose fit with a zip fly and button. Tapered legs with a woven panel down each side.
Joggers in light sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Straight-cut tops in soft cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and front-facing shoulder seams. Double-layered in a contrasting colour around the neckline and hem.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with sturdy jersey on the undersides of the sleeves. Notch lapels in soft faux fur, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Lined.

Cardigan and a pair of trousers in soft velour made from an organic cotton blend. Cardigan with buttons down the front, a frill over the shoulders and long sleeves. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a wide turned-up hem with a small appliqué on the front.

LIMITED EDITION. Straight-cut, double-layered top in airy viscose and chiffon crêpe with zigzag edges. Concealed zip at the back, a round neckline and loose, narrow beaded fringes at the top. Slightly longer at the back.
Mules in imitation suede with a braided trim around the soles and wide foot strap with concealed elastic at the side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 6.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Jacket in patterned, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front.

Glittery backpack that changes colour when viewed from different angles. Zip and handle at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a padded back plate. One outer compartment with a zip that is decorated with a large faux fur pompom. Lined. Size 10x27x34 cm.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Sports jacket in soft pile with a high collar, zip down the front, side pockets, woven sections under the sleeves and down the sides, and a gently rounded hem. Ribbed cuffs and narrow ribbing around the collar and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Wide blouse in a patterned weave with elastication and decorative gathers around the neckline and a small frilled collar. Long raglan sleeves with wide smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed style with an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Sandals with narrow straps, covered block heels and imitation leather insoles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Thin Alice band in metal with plastic pearly beads.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with a motif on the chest. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist, side pockets and fake fly.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in superstretch cotton twill with covered elastication at the waist and a fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and wide, flared legs.

Push-up bra in ribbed microfibre with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with gathers in the sides for best fit and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The sweatshirt is layered at the bottom over woven fabric with a rounded hem and decorative button.
Shirt in soft denim made from Tencel™ lyocell with embroidery. Collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, gathered seam at the front and long sleeves.
Thong briefs in jersey and lace with a low, V-shaped waist and lined gusset.
Top in satin with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and spaghetti straps.
Lined, non-wired, one-shoulder bikini top with a cut-out section at the front. No fasteners.
Long, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, long sleeves, discreet side pockets and slits in the sides of the hem. Tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Unlined.
Set with two plastic foam fancy dress masks in different designs with two elastic straps at the back.
Shorts in woven fabric with back pockets and a smocked high waist with a frill trim.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft satin with lace details. Top with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and short slits in the sides.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles, and fluted soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in cotton. Jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front and concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in cotton piqué with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.

Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam with concealed elastication and detachable tie belt at the waist. Skirt with a wrapover, asymmetric, flounced hem. Jersey lining.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Fully lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts. Detachable ties at the back of the neck, ties at the back, side support and a silicone trim at the top.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short, fitted skirt in a sturdy brocade weave made from recycled polyester containing glittery threads. Visible metal zip at the front and a concealed button on the inside of the waistband. Lining in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Satin trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a decorative, sewn-on knot detail at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
